name: RoboLoop
description:
RoboLoop is a charming hand-animated puzzle game with a simple maze premise that becomes less and less straightforward the further you go. Avoid hazards, collect gems, and help the robots complete their tasks so the factory can run like a well-oiled machine!

Credits:

Programming, Art and Level Design: Simon Massad

Writing: Alex Rose

Music: Dominic Lutheran

You can find more of Dominic's music here:

https://soundcloud.com/dominic-lutheran

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqzHO7tnTkvqWuWAwXz1YNQ
